markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wavetouched Paragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=952) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 13 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Bonuwat ethnicity

</column>

---

You have been blessed by the sea, granting you the ability to swim like a fish. You gain a 15-foot swim Speed.

**Special** If you have the [Bonuwat Wavetouched](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=96) background, you can take this feat at 1st level instead of 5th.
name: Wavetouched Paragon
